entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cornwall
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:57 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint-Anicet 11:00 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
Temperature: -1.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -4.5°C
Wind: WSW 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h before morning. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
